sentences.en: Am I mope?'the hedgehog smile and reply.
sentences.cn: “我忧郁 吗 ? ” 刺猬轻轻地笑了.

sentences.en: Don't mope around the house like that go for a walk.
sentences.cn: 别这么没精打采地在家里打转,出去散散步吧.

sentences.en: Don't mope round the house like that -- go for a walk.
sentences.cn: 别在家里那样闷闷不乐地闲荡 —— 去散散步.

sentences.en: Don’t lie there moping on a lovely morning like this!
sentences.cn: 这么美好的一个早晨，你就别躺在那里自怨自艾了！

sentences.en: Get on with life and don't sit back and mope.
sentences.cn: 活跃一些享受生活，不要闲呆着闷闷不乐的。

sentences.en: Go out and have some fun, child. Don't mope about in the house all day.
sentences.cn: 孩子,出去玩玩吧. 别总是没精打采地在屋里打转.

sentences.en: He is mope, only thoughtful and quiet.
sentences.cn: 他“不”是那种忧郁的人, 只是“好”思考,“不”多说话.

sentences.en: He is no mope, only thoughtful and quiet.
sentences.cn: 他不是那种忧郁的人, 只是好思考,不多说话.

sentences.en: It's a magic you are just right to me when I strait and mope.
sentences.cn: 当我困难和不开心的时候,你就会恰恰好出现在我面前. 这 真 是不可思议.

sentences.en: Mope around He's been moping around ( the house ) all day.
sentences.cn: 他整天都在 ( 房子 ) 周围瞎转悠.

sentences.en: The week he died, we all sat around and moped.
sentences.cn: 他去世的那个星期，我们都闷闷不乐地闲坐着。

sentences.en: Was there any use buying Dilcey if she was going to mope about the child?
sentences.cn: 只买来迪尔茜,要是她整天惦记孩子,又有什么用?

sentences.en: When my dad lost his job, he would just mope around the house all day.
sentences.cn: 如果我爸爸丢了工作, 他就整天呆在家里闷闷不乐.

sentences.en: Why do you always so mope?'asked the fish lightly to the hedgehog.
sentences.cn: “为什么你总是那么忧郁 呢 ?”鱼默默地问刺猬.

sentences.en: Why do you wait and mope?
sentences.cn: 你为什么等待且忧郁不乐?

words.tran_cn: 助动车；机动脚踏两用车
抑郁不乐；生闷气（mope的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to feel sorry for yourself, without making any effort to do anything or be more happy
